entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets before morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
